casebody.data:
CONNECTICUT STATE EMPLOYEES ASSOCIATION v. DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING ET AL. (14325)

O’Connell, Schaller and Santaniello, Js.

Argued January 9 decision released January 30, 1996 Robert J. Krzys, for the appellant (plaintiff). Maria C. Rodriguez, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, were Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Charles A. Overend, assistant attorney general, for the appellees (defendants). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
